Submission Guidelines

Invitation to the workshop will be based on accepted position papers, 3-6 pages in length. All papers must be submitted electronically in PDF, Postscript, or MS Word format. Submissions will be reviewed by the workshop program committee and designated reviewers. Papers will be evaluated based on technical quality, originality, relevance, and presentation.

All accepted papers will be posted at the workshop Web site prior to the workshop date, to give all participants the opportunity to read them before the workshop. In addition, the accepted papers will be published in a Workshop Proceedings as a technical report.

The deadline for original paper submissions has passed. Authors of accepted papers can submit the final versions of their papers via our CyberChair Web site.

Important Dates

  • Submission Deadline: January 27, 2003 (This is a hard deadline. Due to the short review period, no extensions will be offered.)
  • Notification of Acceptance: February 10, 2003
  • Final papers due: February 24, 2003
  • Workshop: March 17, 2003
